short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save videos and other web pages for later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Too many Chrome tabs slowing down your computer? StoreForLater can clear them all up for you.

This lightweight extension stores the URL for the webpage you currently have open and its state at the click of a button.

The pages/videos you’ll get round to reading/watching later will be back whenever you want, just as you left them.

When you store a page with a video (e.g. a YouTube video) and reopen it, you’ll be right where you left off in the video.

Storing a long article and don’t want to lose your place? StoreForLater will keep your scroll position for when you reopen it.

Keeps your webpages safely stored even when Chrome quits/crashes/updates/etc.

Cut down on Chrome’s crazy RAM usage with StoreForLater!
